content.prompt: The excerpt could best be used to explain the significance of which of the following historical situations?

choices.label: The impact of segregation in the South
The result of federal policies toward American Indian nations
The role of journalism in reform movements
The challenges faced by immigrants settling in the West

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
